resources.string: It does not appear that Bluetooth Low Energy is supported on this device.
It appears that Android\'s less-than-perfect bluetooth stack has gone astray. It is suggested that you drop a nuke to perhaps alleviate the problem.
It appears that Android\'s bluetooth stack is completely broken. A phone restart may be required.
Something weird happened with the underlying ble stack. It will probably recover but you may have to nuke the stack or restart your phone if you keep seeing this.
